website_summaries.verdict: Great way to jolly up a tree, fence or wall.
pros: Eye-catching, fun, and colorful with bright coloring
cons: Mounting screws are not always up to par

customer_reviews.title: Quality, good gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter-in-law who has cancer and is under hospice care, maybe her last. She smiled, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The front detail is good, but the keyhole on the back, used to hang it, was not drilled enough to hang it. I should have sent it back, but instead my husband decided to fix it - it cracked. If you buy it and encounter the same problem, send it back!! Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn2443

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to outdoor weather.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, nailed it to a tree about a year ago in upstate NY. My grandkids are intrigued with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gnome house
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable on my gnome house & garden. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Decorative Gnomes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law loves these gnomes that I got for her for Christmas. I got several for she loves to work in her yard and loves to decorate a tree stump by putting a little roof on the stump and around the "house", I will post a picture when she gets it finished.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Hall

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to install the hanger plate better - Chinese screw/assembly work is sub-par.
customer_reviews.text: The mount fitting on the back fell off (one loose screw was all there was). China is ok for the main body moulding and the painting, but China with parts that are screwed together still is bad news after 20 years of trying. Be prepared to properly install the hanger plate on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Knothole Gnomes
customer_reviews.text: I received my two Knothole Gnomes in perfect condition and in a timely manner from the vendor. The Gnomes are made of a plastic resin of some kind and are painted well. I am very happy with them with one perhaps minor exception; The gnome comes with a very small keyhole type slot in the back that makes mounting on a tree a bit of a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Well made tree gnome.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-formed resin product. Colors are bright and distinct, they do not run together. Details of gnome and rest of item are also very nicely done, no aberrations or other malformations that I can see. Packaged well and delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Gnome Home on a Tree!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and they absolutely love it! Much larger than expected. Well made, heavy and the painted details are great. Would purchase again....this time for myself :).
customer_reviews.author: psjsms22

customer_reviews.title: This little gnome was the perfect addition to our backyard
customer_reviews.text: This little gnome was the perfect addition to our backyard. He makes me smile each time I walk out onto our back deck.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly enjoying this adorable tree decoratiion.
customer_reviews.text: This garden gnomes tree sculpture looks so cute on my tree. It hangs easily. The order was shipped immediately and the quality is excellent. We enjoy looking at it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and attractive, but very small for the price. Wish they made these bigger. I will keep the three I bought but just letting you know they Re small.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It arrived within the stated time, was well packaged, and as described. My only hope is that it is somewhat weather-proofed as I am using it to create a gnome garden.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. This gnome will look wonderful on a tree-stump in my garden. Very well packaged and arrived quickly with my prime shipping. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Esrunami

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to our Gnome garden
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my gnome garden and wish I would have purchased the companion to it, the Gnome coming out of the door. It's a great additional to our gnome garden, well made and easy to hang. Our grandchildren love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kzar

customer_reviews.title: Look for something with better quality
customer_reviews.text: Hanger broke off when trying to fit a screw head. Poor assembly and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A

customer_reviews.title: Improvement needed
customer_reviews.text: The piece in the back to hang is absolutely no good. Fell over and broke in two days.
customer_reviews.author: Praim

customer_reviews.title: Great art work for my tree.
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered as promised. Was a little larger than I thought it should have been, but great product. I ordered this along with the Garden Gnome Home Door tree art and it looks so cute on my tree. I recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy

customer_reviews.title: great for front doors on homes
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my front door, nice conversation piece, friends and family wants me to buy them one now for Christmas love my gnome garden
customer_reviews.author: Linda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: It is bigger than I expected but is very cute and looks fun in the yard. I have other gnomes too and he fits right in. Love him!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Root

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken but was replaced
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a Christmas gift for a tree lover in the family. Box was crushed so item probably was broken in shipping. Returned after Christmas and received replacement item quickly. Also purchased the Gnome tree Door. These are such a cute addition to any tree and spark imagination in my niece that plays in the yard. "Things that make me smile ... Gnomes" :))
customer_reviews.author: BernieS

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much for such a prompt delivery.You just made a very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I also enjoy looking at this in my garden. Its an eye opener. My garden theme is fairies and knomes. I am receiving so many compliments on all the work I put in designing my theme
customer_reviews.author: ANNA LOZA-ARATA

customer_reviews.title: Gnome to make you smile
customer_reviews.text: Cute & makes you happy just to look at him. Delivered promptly. Will probably order more for gifts in the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: love this lil guy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, so much cuter in person, and it is pretty big .. I love it I am excited to give it to her
customer_reviews.author: Michele Hokanson

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to the gnome garden but definitely need the right tree - we improvised and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda

customer_reviews.title: Like It!
customer_reviews.text: I did antique it so it would be a little less bright. It makes my tree stump gnome home really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: tree stump art
customer_reviews.text: We applied this to a tree stumb along for a bit of backyard whimsy...
customer_reviews.author: Evan A. Ash

customer_reviews.title: what a view !
customer_reviews.text: its cute for the garden we will see how it will weather in time , but for now it looks great
customer_reviews.author: charles walpole

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo....cute
customer_reviews.text: Soooo.....cute!!! Looks awesome on the tree trunk. Just as advertised, great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Camper

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: He so cute and I love gromes want him in my yard for people to see and make me smile
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great. The gnome isn't cheap looking or scary like you find from some other products. Looking forward to giving it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gnome
customer_reviews.text: Love my gnome on the tree by the stream looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Seendie

customer_reviews.title: great just what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: great just what i wanted , don't have any trees so attached them to a piece of wood that had been cut for the fire look great
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Hinton

customer_reviews.title: My sister loves her gnomes! This one, she ...
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves her gnomes! This one, she hangs in a tree in the summer and inside in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Perkinson

customer_reviews.title: Welcoming ghome
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my gnome tree. Nice size and lots of detail. Adds a nice touch to my gnome and fairy garden.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Item is sturdy and very cute
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what I needed to complete our gnome home. I would recommend this item for purchase if you have an interest in gnomes.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Herbert

customer_reviews.title: DESIGN TOSCANO
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE COMPANY TO DEAL WITH. IN LESS THAN 24 HOURS THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE PEOPLE CONTACTED ME. NO ONE, BUT NO ONE CAN BEAT THE CUSTOMER SERVICE OF THIS COMPANY. THESE PEOPLE GO ABOVE AND BEYOND TO MAKE SURE THEIR CUSTOMER IS SATISFIED. THEY HAVE EARNED AN AAA+++++++ WITH ME AND MY FAMILY AND FRIENDS, AND I PLAN ON ORDERING A LOT MORE FROM THEM IN THE FUTURE. AND I LOVE THE FACT THAT THEY SEND YOU A CATALOG.............FANTASTIC.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE CARDISH

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this gnome...perfect fit for my lost tree...turned into gnome garden Attached to tree securely and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Vowl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect looking out the side of the gnome house I built from the remaining trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Gnome Will Not Hang
customer_reviews.text: The hole for the hanging the Gnome was constructed incorrectly and there is no way to hang the gnome. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Lake

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: This prodykt vere good .I don't have a problem with this product.I recomed this product for my frends.Ivere happe.Thank you vere mach
customer_reviews.author: andrey

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: THese are very nice - you do need the right kind of tree but otherwise the workmanship is great and easy to like
customer_reviews.author: Hilda

product_meta.title: Design Toscano QL4283 Statue-Knothole Welcome Tree Window-Fairy Garden-Gnome Village, Full Color
product_meta.description: Style:WindowEven the trees of the forest come to life when you add our Toscano-exclusive "Knothole Gnome, " who welcomes garden guests from the window of its woodland home! With jaunty cap and warm smile, our mythical gnome is cast in designer resin with keyhole slots for attaching to your favorite tree. 6½ "Wx2"Dx9"H. 1 lb.
feature_bullets: WELCOME HOME GNOME - Welcome our Toscano lawn gnomes to your fairy garden with our funny gnome statue who hunts for fairies outside his window and tips his gnome hat to greet visitors
GARDEN GNOMES - Our mini gnome house window easily hangs on your tree, garden fence or home wall with keyhole slots - add the matching door to create the perfect gnome set
HIGH-QUALITY - Hand-cast using real crushed stone bonded with durable designer resin, our fairy garden gnomes are topped with UV resistant paint
DESIGN TOSCANO GNOME - Exclusive to the Design Toscano brand, this cute nome statue makes a perfect gift for home, lawn or garden
Our perfectly sized tree gnomes figurines measure 6½"Wx2"Dx9"H. 1 lb.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
